text: “Eghtɨ gumazim uabɨ zueghsɨ bizir ofa damuamibagh ivezamin dagɨaba puvatɨgh, a sipsipɨn nguzir apurir vamɨrara inigh. Sipsipɨn kam a gumazimɨn osɨmtɨzim agevir ofa. Eghtɨ gɨn ofa gamir gumazim an suiragh a fegh a damutɨ a nan damazimɨn ighuavamangɨ. Gumazir kam, 1 kilogrem plauan aghuim uaghan a inigh, olivɨn borem sara a veregh wit tuer ofa damu. Egh a olivɨn borer aghuir itarir pumuning vɨraram aningɨn suiragh izɨ.
